user.title: Power Max Tracker Configuration
user.description: Configure the Power Max Tracker integration to track maximum power values.

data_description.source_sensor: Select the power sensor to track (must provide watts).
data_description.num_max_values: Number of maximum power values to track (1-10).
data_description.monthly_reset: Reset maximum values to 0 on the 1st of each month.
data_description.single_peak_per_day: Track only one peak value per day instead of multiple hourly peaks.
data_description.price_per_kw: Fee per kilowatt for electricity cost calculations.
data_description.cycle_type: Select the interval for tracking maximum power values.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Power Max Tracker
reconfigure.description: Update the basic configuration for your Power Max Tracker integration.

data_description.source_sensor: Select the power sensor to track (must provide watts).
data_description.monthly_reset: Reset maximum values to 0 on the 1st of each month.
data_description.num_max_values: Number of maximum power values to track (1-10).
data_description.single_peak_per_day: Track only one peak value per day instead of multiple hourly peaks.
data_description.price_per_kw: Fee per kilowatt for electricity cost calculations.
data_description.power_scaling_factor: Scaling factor to apply to power values (auto-detected if not set).
data_description.cycle_type: Select the interval for tracking maximum power values.

reconfigure_time.title: Time & Advanced Settings
reconfigure_time.description: Configure time-based tracking and advanced options.

data_description.start_time: Start time for applying the scaling factor.
data_description.stop_time: End time for applying the scaling factor.
data_description.time_scaling_factor: Multiplier for power values during this time period.
data_description.binary_sensor: Only track power when this binary sensor is 'on' (leave empty for always-on tracking).

time_config.title: Time & Advanced Settings
time_config.description: Configure time-based tracking and advanced options.

data_description.start_time: Start time for applying the scaling factor.
data_description.stop_time: End time for applying the scaling factor.
data_description.time_scaling_factor: Multiplier for power values during this time period.
data_description.binary_sensor: Only track power when this binary sensor is 'on' (leave empty for always-on tracking).

error.invalid_max_values: Number of max values must be an integer between 1 and 10.
error.binary_sensor_exclusive: Cannot use time-based settings when a gating sensor is selected. Choose either time-based tracking OR sensor-based gating, not both.
